content.raw:
* Sounds good; I hadn't thought about `gz stats`. But certainly it would be good to get the help printout if there weren't enough command-line arguments for the given command.

* I was thinking that it would be useful to add an option that will display the names of cameras in the scene. I can make a feature request for that or try to implement it.

* Thanks.
content.html:
• Sounds good; I hadn't thought about gz stats. But certainly it would be good to get the help printout if there weren't enough command-line arguments for the given command.

  • I was thinking that it would be useful to add an option that will display the names of cameras in the scene. I can make a feature request for that or try to implement it.

  • Thanks.
